subject: Re: [junit] Digest Number 1846
msgSnippet: ... Consider the sponsored link that appears when you do a google search on Agitar: Don t just automate test execution Automate Java test creation ... Robert
messageBody:
On Jun 1, 2006, at 4:35 AM, junit@yahoogroups.com wrote:

>>
>> Moreover I fear a tool that can figure out tests for you may give
>> developers an excuse not to write their own tests; especially if it
>> is marketed to managers and developers as a way to reduce unit test
>> writing time.
>
>
> I share this concern and I am trying to ascertain whether it is
> marketed
> this way or if it is a misunderstanding on the part of those being
> marketed
> to.

Consider the sponsored link that appears when you do a google search
on Agitar:
"Don't just automate test execution Automate Java test creation"
